xising HBV infection in a human in need of such treatment, wherein the method comprises administering to said human a therapeutically effective amount of a compound of Formula I, a stereoisomer, tautomer, prodrug or pharmaceutically acceptable salt thereof. COMBINATION THERAPY

The compounds of the invention can be used together with interferon, pegylated interferons, Lamivudine, Adefovir dipivoxil, Entecavir, Telbivudine, and Tenofovir disoproxil for the treatment or prophylaxis of HBV. EXAMPLES

The invention will be more fully understood by reference to the following examples. They should not, however, be construed as limiting the scope of the invention.
